channel.title: IF Answers - Recent questions tagged offset

item.title: Map drawing and offset bugs [Quest] [Game breaking]
item.description:
Here is a video describing all the problems and a download link to the aslx file in the desc. of the video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Q_Dex6j_Ww&feature=youtu.be

Basically my map is drawing all weird like and the exit parentoffsetx isn't doing what it should. I have gridparentoffset_auto turned off for all rooms which didn't really do anything.
